title: ICU Conformance test data description
description: This documents the format of language names test data for execution

Test scenario.description: Obsolete tag to be removed and replaced with test Type

url.description: Reference to the source of this conformance data

tests.description: list of N tests for language names

label.description: A numeric ID, unique for the set of tests

hexhash.description: A hexadecimal hash code for the test without the label

language_label.description: locale tag of the source language

locale_label.description: locale tag of the language being described
